Hi Elise,

I just wanted to give you a quick update, our team is still actively working on the order quantity issue.

We’ve been looking into this since last week and have found that the custom implementation added by the previous developer a few years ago is starting to show some limitations with recent WooCommerce updates.

Here’s a quick summary of where we’re at:
  • Investigating the root cause of the quantity mismatch for new customers.
  • Testing fixes on our staging environment to ensure they work without affecting live orders.
  • Reviewing the existing custom implementation to prevent future issues.

Our team is carefully testing and applying solutions on our staging environment to make sure everything works smoothly without affecting live orders.

To help us ensure the fix works perfectly, we’d really appreciate it if any plugin updates could be held off for now while we complete our testing.

We’ll keep you updated as soon as we have a solution ready to go live. Thank you so much for your patience — it really means a lot!

action.text: Marcelo Meneses assigned to Marcelo Meneses

full_threads.body:
Hey Elise,

Thanks for reaching out. We’ve received your ticket and our team is now looking into it.

Just a quick note: due to the holiday season, updates may take a little longer than usual.

In the event of an emergency, you may contact us by phone at 1300 072 134.

Rest assured, we’ll get back to you as soon as possible.

Wishing you a wonderful festive season

Good morning,

Just forwarding onto you another order where quantity that has come through (1 box each eye) does not match the money paid for the order (2 boxes each eye).

This customer is brand new to Total Contacts.

Are you able to ascertain the how and why the quantity emailed through to us and the supplier does not match the quantity paid for?

Kind regards,


Elise



​www.totalcontacts.com.au

https://www.facebook.com/totalcontacts
